title: Disconnecting
body: Currently in a match and not able to reconnect even though my ping is stable. The first few minutes were fine but i right after 2/3 mins in, i kept on getting disconnected and reconnected. I checked connection to league using Haste and it doesnt show anything out of the norm. Tried connecting again around 19:29 mins and it works but once it got to 21 mins, i dc but everything suddenly works after 23 mins. Im not sure if it was player caused or not so im just posting it here so i can know how to avoid this.

replies.body:
Alright :)
Done with the match so i can take a look st the guide
Happened during my promo series as well.

Yikes that really sucks that this happened in a promo! It sounds like there might be something going on with your network that might be preventing you from staying in those games, but it might also be related to packet loss as well. Let's start by troubleshooting some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is still setup properly there.

Yeeeaaaaa you're gonna wanna finish that game before coming back to look for troubleshooting steps. We can't very well try to help you fix this issue while you're on the Rift, not to mention you won't be able to perform any of the steps while in a game. Focus on the match, then once you're done go through the steps in this [**network settings guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
